__e: You should all know exactly what it is you're up against what Agent Scully's up against.
But if you kill me, you'll also kill Agent Scully.

Cos if I can't believe that, then these other possibilities that you talk about, that Mulder talks about, that Agent Scully talks about, if they're real... if they're real, then... that's something else I could have done to save my son.
You'll find nothing, Agent Booth, because there's nothing to find.
Okay, so if the money didn't come from Agent Booth then where did it come from?
Look, Agent Booth, uh, I have a lot of work to do, so I don't have time for this.
Agent Cooper, I'd like to help you, but, uh, I got a little problem here.
Agent Cooper, I'm so sorry. I don't know what happened.
Agent Cooper, did this seem work-related?
Don't underestimate the seriousness of this, Agent Mulder.
I really appreciate you coming in.
You're the agent that made that deal for him, aren't you?
One thing. This someone or something Agent Mulder said might be coming?
Agent Mulder could not have done it because he was with me.
It was the man, Agent Mulder; you came here to ask me about.
I'm not sure I follow, Agent Gibbs.
I'd love to show Agent Gibbs what I can do.
I don't know what to tell you, Agent Gibbs.
